activity.title: Play Fetch
activity.description: It's a great way to exercise your dog's body and mind while engaging in interactive play.

activity.title: Dog Parks
activity.description: Visiting a dog park allows your dog to socialize with other dogs and play off-leash in a secure environment.

activity.title: Tug-of-War
activity.description: Engage in a controlled game of tug using a rope toy. It's a great way to satisfy your dog's natural desire to pull and chew, while also promoting bonding.
